newsitem.title: USA: Top U.S. general to mark Thanksgiving with troops.
newsitem.headline: Top U.S. general to mark Thanksgiving with troops.

text.p: Gen. John Shalikashvili, chairman of the U.S. military Joint Chiefs of Staff, will have Thanksgiving lunch with U.S. peacekeeping troops in Sinai and dinner with sailors on the aircraft carrier Enterprise, the Defence Department said on Wednesday.
It said he would return to Washington on Friday.
The U.S. holiday originated with English colonists who gave thanks for their survival in the early 17th century.
